sentences.en: After the banquets, the concerts and the table tennis exhibitor, he went home tiredly.
sentences.cn: 参加宴会 、 出席音乐会、观看乒乓球表演之后, 他疲倦地回到了家里.

sentences.en: Ceremony with the Curators and exhibitor Mr. Rocco YIM sitting on front row.
sentences.cn: 林云峰教授致开幕辞,坐于前排的有三位策展人、严迅奇建筑师.

sentences.en: Each exhibitor requires SEPARATE invitation letter for VISA application.
sentences.cn: 每封邀请函只供单个参展商作申请签证之用.

sentences.en: Exhibitor are required to remit booth fee to the designated account of the Fair on time.
sentences.cn: 参展单位应按组委会要求按时将摊位费汇入组委会的指定帐户.

sentences.en: Exhibitor Entrance Permit will be supplied by the Organizer only to delegates listed below.
sentences.cn: 主办单位只向下列人仕提供入场通行证.

sentences.en: Exhibitor list and its brief introduction on the Expo booklet.
sentences.cn: 会刊刊登参展商名录及简介.

sentences.en: Exhibitor: Certainly. Take as many as you need. Come back any time you're ready.
sentences.cn: 展出者: 好的. 你要多少就拿多少.你什么时候准备好了就什么时候再来.

sentences.en: His company attended an international fair as an exhibitor and hired a translator for temporary service.
sentences.cn: 他们公司作为参展商参加展会,临时雇了一位翻译帮忙.

sentences.en: Login name & password: please refer to the cover letter attached with your Exhibitor's Manual.
sentences.cn: 请于以上网址递交参展商入场通行证资料,登入名称 及 密码: 请参阅随展商手册附上之信件.

sentences.en: No cancellation or compensation launched by exhibitor will be accepted.
sentences.cn: 参展商不得因上述变更为由取消合同或索取赔偿.

sentences.en: Provide customs applying service of imported and exported goods for exhibitor.
sentences.cn: 为展商提供进出口货物的报关服务.

sentences.en: Schedules will be sent out to all exhibitors.
sentences.cn: 日程安排将会发送给所有的参展者。

sentences.en: See the exhibitor manual for the charging reserved for hotel.
sentences.cn: 预定宾馆收费可见参展商手册.

sentences.en: The exhibitor is responsible for exhibition piece packaging, shipping and insurance.
sentences.cn: 展出作品之包装 、 运送、保险,由展出者自行负责.

sentences.en: With its fangs pulled out, the venomous snake is extraordinarily docile in the exhibitor's hands.
sentences.cn: 剧毒异蛇被拔掉毒牙后, 在参展商手中变得服服帖帖.

words.tran_cn: 展览，显示；展览会；展览品
展出者；获得奖学金的学生
裸露癖；自我宣传癖；喜出风头癖
裸露症患者；倾向自我宣传的人；喜欢出风头的人

trans.tran_en: An exhibitor is a person or company whose work or products are being shown in an exhibition
